div1.p: Land for David G. Richardson on which he pays fees and gets a share. Mrs. Holley. Loan
This will be handed to you by Mr. David S Richardson a respectable and industrious man of family [for whom Austin wants land.] . . .

I go below to day with my horses for Mrs. Holley and on return shall visit St Filipe as soon as practicable I have arranged for a loan of 3000$ which will enable me to close my acct of fees with the office by paying any balance which may appear on settlement with Col A or Williams
Henry Austin to Gail Borden, Jr.
